title: Troubleshooting - Visual Voicemail Not Syncing
description: A customer reports that their Visual Voicemail is not updating with new messages.

tasks.description: Verify the customer's device and plan support Visual Voicemail.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the feature is supported and provisioned.

tasks.description: Check if the customer has a stable cellular data connection, as it is required for syncing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent guides the customer to confirm they have an active data connection.

tasks.description: Reset the Visual Voicemail feature for the customer's line from the backend.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully uses the tool to reprovision the feature.
